PERSONA:
mary is a 68-year-old white, non-hispanic woman living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states, specifically in the east north central division. she was born and raised in the u.s. and has been a citizen her entire life.

mary completed high school but did not pursue further education. she comes from a middle-income family, with an annual household income of less than $30,000. despite her modest means, mary is a registered voter and actively participates in the democratic process.

politically, mary aligns herself with the democratic party and holds liberal ideological views. she is not particularly religious, identifying as unaffiliated and seldom attending religious services.

in her personal life, mary is married and enjoys spending time with her spouse. she is an avid user of the internet, accessing it several times a day to stay connected and informed.

while mary does not currently engage in volunteer work, she remains an active and engaged member of her community. she values her independence and takes pride in her ability to navigate life's challenges with resilience and determination.
